targets.query:
DeviceGroup
| summarize arg_max(TimeStamp, *) by DeviceGroupId
| where DeviceGroupId == '$deviceGroupId'
| project DeviceGroupName

let deviceGroup= DeviceTwin
| where $defaultQuery
| $projection;
let devicetable = DeviceTwin
| join kind= inner deviceGroup on DeviceId
| summarize arg_max(TimeStamp, *) by DeviceId
| where isnotnull(Twin.properties.reported.Latitude) and isnotnull(Twin.properties.reported.Longitude)
| project DeviceId, latitude=Twin.properties.reported.Latitude, longitude=Twin.properties.reported.Longitude;
let alerts = Alerts
| join kind = inner devicetable on DeviceId
| where $__timeFilter(DateCreated)
| summarize alertsCount=count() by DeviceId;
devicetable
| join kind = leftouter alerts on DeviceId
| extend metric = iff(isnotnull(alertsCount), alertsCount , 0)
| project DeviceId, latitude, longitude, metric

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let errorCount = AzureDiagnostics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.DEVICES" and ResourceType == "IOTHUBS"
| where Level == "Error" and ResultDescription == "ThrottlingException"
| count;
errorCount
| extend iotHubHealth = case(Count <= 3, "Healthy", 
                       Count <= 10, "Review", 
                       "Risk")
| project iotHubHealth

let errorCount = AzureDiagnostics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.DOCUMENTDB"
| where Level == "Error" and ResultDescription == "ThrottlingException"
| count;
errorCount
| extend cosmosdbHealth = case(Count <= 3, "Healthy", 
                       Count <= 10, "Review", 
                       "Risk")
| project cosmosdbHealth

let errorCount = FailedIngestion
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| count;
errorCount
| extend adxHealth = case(Count <= 3, "Healthy", 
                       Count <= 10, "Review", 
                       "Risk")
| project adxHealth

let errorCount = AzureDiagnostics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.EVENTHUB"
| where Level == "Error" and ResultDescription == "ThrottlingException"
| count;
errorCount
| extend eventhubHealth = case(Count <= 3, "Healthy", 
                       Count <= 10, "Review", 
                       "Risk")
| project eventhubHealth

let errorCount = KubePodInventory
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ServiceName
| where PodStatus != "Running"
| count;
errorCount
| extend aksHealth = case(Count <= 1, "Healthy", 
                       Count <= 5, "Review", 
                       "Risk")
| project aksHealth

targets.query:
let deviceGroup= DeviceTwin
| where $defaultQuery
| $projection;
DeviceTwin
| join kind= inner deviceGroup on DeviceId
| summarize arg_max(TimeStamp, *) by DeviceId 
| where IsDeleted == false
| count as Registered;

let deviceGroup= DeviceTwin
| where $defaultQuery
| $projection;
Telemetry
| join kind= inner deviceGroup on DeviceId
| where TimeStamp >= now()-180s and TimeStamp < now()
| summarize arg_max(TimeStamp, *) by DeviceId
| project DeviceId
| count as Connected

let deviceGroup= DeviceTwin
| where $defaultQuery
| $projection;
Telemetry
| join kind= inner deviceGroup on DeviceId
| where $__timeFilter(TimeStamp)
| summarize arg_max(TimeStamp, *) by DeviceId
| project DeviceId
| order by DeviceId asc

let deviceGroup= DeviceTwin
| where $defaultQuery
| $projection;
Telemetry
| join kind= inner 
    deviceGroup
 on DeviceId
| where iff(isnotnull('$selecteddeviceid') and isnotempty('$selecteddeviceid'), DeviceId == '$selecteddeviceid',1==1) 
| where TimeStamp >= unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime($__to)-30m and TimeStamp < unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime($__to)
| evaluate bag_unpack(Data)
| project-away deviceId*, iothub*, _*, messageId*,DeviceId1,Message*
| order by TimeStamp asc
| take 5000

let deviceGroup= DeviceTwin
| where $defaultQuery
| $projection;
Alerts
| join kind= inner deviceGroup on DeviceId
| where $__timeFilter(DateCreated)
| summarize Count=count() by Device=DeviceId
| order by Device asc nulls last

let deviceGroup= DeviceTwin
| where $defaultQuery
| $projection;
Alerts
| join kind= inner deviceGroup on DeviceId
| where $__timeFilter(DateCreated)
| summarize value=count() by metric=tostring(RuleSeverity)

let deviceGroup= DeviceTwin
| where $defaultQuery
| $projection;
Alerts
| join kind= inner deviceGroup on DeviceId
| where $__timeFilter(DateCreated)
| summarize value=count() by metric=tostring(Status)

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.DEVICES" and ResourceType == "IOTHUBS"
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1d)
| extend parsed_json = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend DeviceId = tostring(parsed_json.deviceId)
| where  isnotempty(DeviceId) and DeviceId == '$selecteddeviceid'
| extend DeviceOp = strcat(DeviceId, "-Operation-",OperationName) 
| distinct TimeGenerated, DeviceOp,DeviceId,ResultType,ResultDescription

targets.query:
Alerts
| where $__timeFilter(DateCreated)
| where DeviceId == '$selecteddeviceid'
| summarize value=count() by metric=tostring(Status)

Alerts
| where $__timeFilter(DateCreated)
| where DeviceId == '$selecteddeviceid'
| summarize count() by bin(DateCreated, 10m), tostring(Status)
| order by DateCreated asc

Telemetry
| where TimeStamp >= unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime($fromtime)-15m and TimeStamp < (iff((unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime($fromtime)+15m) > now(),now(),unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime($fromtime)+15m))
| where DeviceId == '$selecteddeviceid'
| evaluate bag_unpack(Data)
| project-away deviceId*, iothub*, _*, messageId*,Message*
| order by TimeStamp asc

list.definition:
database("{5}").DeviceGroup
| summarize arg_max(TimeStamp, *) by DeviceGroupId
| where IsDeleted == false
| order by TimeStamp desc
| take 1
| project DeviceGroupId
list.name: deviceGroupId
list.query:
database("{5}").DeviceGroup
| summarize arg_max(TimeStamp, *) by DeviceGroupId
| where IsDeleted == false
| order by TimeStamp desc
| take 1
| project DeviceGroupId

list.name: projection
list.query: summarize arg_max(TimeStamp,*) by DeviceId | where IsDeleted == false | project DeviceId

list.definition:
database("{5}").DeviceGroup
| summarize arg_max(TimeStamp,*) by DeviceGroupId
| where DeviceGroupId == "$deviceGroupId" and IsDeleted == false
| project DeviceGroupConditions=iff(isempty(DeviceGroupConditions),"1==1",DeviceGroupConditions)
list.name: defaultQuery
list.query:
database("{5}").DeviceGroup
| summarize arg_max(TimeStamp,*) by DeviceGroupId
| where DeviceGroupId == "$deviceGroupId" and IsDeleted == false
| project DeviceGroupConditions=iff(isempty(DeviceGroupConditions),"1==1",DeviceGroupConditions)
